snippet: Clarence Goodson led the U.S. soccer team onto the Stanford Stadium field for Day 1 of World Cup training, about 20 paces ahead of teammates....

headline.print_headline: US Defender Goodson Seeks Great Role at World Cup
headline.main: US Defender Goodson Seeks Great Role at World Cup

lead_paragraph: Clarence Goodson led the U.S. soccer team onto the Stanford Stadium field for Day 1 of World Cup training, about 20 paces ahead of teammates.
